column4: Somebody help me. I have win xp and ubuntu at the same HD. Now win xp crashes. Is it save for me to format C: and reinstall win xp?
yes, but when you reinstall XP it will mess up grub or whatever your boot loader is so you should save a boot disk that will let you boot back in later.
and don't reformat the whole thing, just any partitions that XP is using (probably the 1st one)
mine is grub. You mean if I dont make emergency disk then my pc won't restart anymore?
